name: Fish Out of Water (Proobly)
description:
Play as a fishy in this 2D platformer. You'll be jumping around and flushing up bees as  you investigate why the village's lake has turned a murky yellow color. Yielded from spitballing random ideas and mashing them together.

Best played on a Windows machine with the default resolution (1280x720)

Controls
Movement - Arrowkeys
Interact - Space
Dash - z
Attack - x


Could have definitely spent more time on this, but this was my first time working with Godot!
Thanks for playing!
